Updated server software

Posted: July 20, 2012

Today Revelstoke Web Hosting took the big leap to jump into the next version of PHP. This site is located on the Revelstoke Web Hosting servers which are located on the Peer1 Network in downtown Vancouver.

We upgraded to the PHP 5.4.x branch which introduces many new features and speed optimizations for modern web development. Here is a list of features that have been included in the versions.

According to this stat, most web hosting companies hosting WordPress are still using 5.2.x which has been deprecated since Dec 16, 2010. There have been numerous security updates and code enhancements along the way. If you are looking for modern web hosting check out Revelstoke Web Hosting for all of your web development needs.

We also upgraded the mySQL database software to the latest 5.5.x branch which includes a tonne of performance enhancements.
